casebody.data:
Bernard J. MALONE, as Trustee in Bankruptcy of Little Falls Dairy Company, Inc., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. Moe BOLSTEIN and David Gimpel, Defendants-Appellees. No. 203, Docket 24323. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Argued March 6, 1957. Decided March 28, 1957. James A. McTiernan, Little Falls, N. Y., for plaintiff-appellant. Bartle Gorman, Utica, N. Y. (J. Walter Augar, Utica, N. Y., on the brief), for defendant-appellee.

Before MEDINA and WATERMAN, Circuit Judges and GALSTON, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed on the opinion of Judge Brennan, D. C., 151 F.Supp. 544.
